title: Sample Deploy Stage
longDescription: The Delivery Pipeline automates continuous deployment.

api-key.description: The IBM Cloud API key is used to access the IBM Container Service API and interact with the cluster. You can obtain your API key with 'bx iam api-key-create' or via the console at https://console.bluemix.net/iam/#/apikeys by clicking **Create API key** (Each API key only can be viewed once).

image-registry-token.description: Container Registry access token. Retrievable via [bx cr tokens]

kube-cluster-name.description: Your cluster name. Retrieve it with [bx cs clusters] or via the console at https://console.bluemix.net/containers-kubernetes/home/clusters.
